QuestData.Title: Dire Situation
QuestData.Description: Good news, we found de source of de corruption.$b$bDe bad news, it is a ritual on de apex of Zanchul.$b$bBlood magic wielding heretics are empowering some sort of dire troll up dere.$b$bHow it made it all de way to de apex without us catching it is something I am sure Raal and I will be arguing about for de next year.$b$bCome, let us stop dis heresy.
